scripts.test: webpack --config webpack.test.config.js && mocha 'builds/tests.js' && npm run build-for-node
scripts.go-update-patch:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (PATCH) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run install-and-test && npm version patch && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-minor:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MINOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run install-and-test && npm version minor && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.go-update-major:
echo '-------------------------------------------
Update version (MAJOR) and deploy to npm...
-------------------------------------------
' && npm run install-and-test && npm version major && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.install-and-test: npm run confirm && npm i && npm run test
